description: This file is a test suite for the React application, using '@testing-library/react' to verify that the 'App' component renders the text related to 'learn react'. It contains imports, a test case, and assertions to ensure the 'App' component behaves as expected.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines a test case named 'renders learn react link' that renders the 'App' component and verifies its content.
